name: app-perf-analytics
description: A complete project that measures and visualizes an end-to-end performance analytic metrics

scripts.install:all-packages: npm run install:express && npm run install:dashboard && npm run install:provider-client && npm run install:analytics-lib
scripts.build:all-packages: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:provider-client && npm run build:analytics-lib
scripts.test: cd packages/app-perf-analytics-dashboard-client && npm run test && cd ../app-perf-analytics-data-provider-client && npm run test

author: cantanert@gmail.com
